alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:13PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and southwestern Willacy Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sebastian, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, Mercedes, La Feria, Santa Rosa, Lyford, Palm Valley, Rangerville, Sebastian, Primera and Combes. This includes Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 26 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo
